mapper.select:
select t1.* from student_info t1
t1.student_number LIKE concat(concat('%',#{fuzzy}),'%') or t1.student_name LIKE concat(concat('%',#{fuzzy}),'%') or t1.student_class LIKE concat(concat('%',#{fuzzy}),'%') or t1.student_year LIKE concat(concat('%',#{fuzzy}),'%')
